USERNAME_TOO_LONG: Username must be 50 characters or less.
USERNAME_TOO_SHORT: Username must be at least 4 characters long.
INVALID_GENDER: Gender must be either male, female, or other.
PASSWORD_FIELDS_REQUIRED: Old password and new password and confirm password are required
PASSWORD_MISMATCH: New password and confirm password do not match
PASSWORD_TOO_SHORT: New password must be at least 8 characters long
